snippet: An encouraging report suggests that the tide could finally be turning in this important battle.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Centers for Disease Control and Prevention report finding that the obesity rate among preschoolers from poor families has fallen in 19 states and American territories, and has risen in only three states; contends that report is an encouraging sign in fight to control childhood obesity, but cautions that there is still much room for improvement in addressing obesity epidemic.
lead_paragraph: An encouraging report suggests that the tide could finally be turning in this important battle.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
